Megatron:





Megatron watched as Sinesis and the others go. "Blast those fools!" He 
growled then thought through the situation. "Good riddance." He walked to 
Scorponok's lab and transformed to robot mode. "Scorponok what's going on? 
Scorponok." He saw the gray robot lying on the ground, in stasis lock.

Megatron growled and frowned. He picked up Scorponok by the neck and walked 
him to the CR tank. He threw him in. He then walked away, back to the main 
section of the cave, and noticed that he was the only one present.
